mapper.select:
SELECT
IFNULL(SUM(lang1Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang2Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang3Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang4Cnt), 0)
(IFNULL(SUM(lang1Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang2Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang3Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang4Cnt), 0))
as totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE 1=1 AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND HOST = #{host}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE 1=1 AND HOST = #{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0

SELECT count(DISTINCT SESSION) AS totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE 1=1 AND HOST = #{host} AND #{endDate} = DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.IntentLog WHERE HOST=#{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND (prob <= 0.4 OR intent = 'Unknown2')
AND lang=#{lang}

SELECT utter AS weakUtter FROM ChatbotLog.IntentLog WHERE HOST=#{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND (prob <= 0.4 OR intent = 'Unknown2')
AND lang=#{lang}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE HOST = #{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND CHANNEL LIKE CONCAT('%', '"sendResult":true' , '%')
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0

SELECT HOUR(createdAt) as hour ,
IFNULL(SUM(lang1Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang2Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang3Cnt), 0)
IFNULL(SUM(lang4Cnt), 0)
(IFNULL(SUM(lang1Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang2Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang3Cnt), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(lang4Cnt), 0))
as count FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE HOUR(createdAt) is not null AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} AND HOST=#{host}
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0
GROUP BY HOUR(createdAt) ORDER BY hour

SELECT HOUR(createdAt) as hour , COUNT(createdAt) as count FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE HOUR(createdAt) is not null AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} AND HOST=#{host}
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0
GROUP BY HOUR(createdAt) ORDER BY hour

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(COUNT),0) AS maxCnt , IFNULL(AVG(COUNT),0) AS avgCnt FROM ( SELECT HOUR(createDate) as hour , COUNT(createDate) as count FROM (SELECT session , MIN(createdAt) as createDate FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} AND HOST= #{host}
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0
GROUP BY session) a WHERE HOUR(createDate) IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HOUR(createDate) ) T

SELECT count(DISTINCT SESSION) AS totalCnt FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE 1=1 AND HOST = #{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND CHANNEL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{channel} ,'%')
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0

SELECT DISTINCT SESSION , CHANNEL AS content FROM ChatbotLog.SessionLog WHERE 1=1 AND HOST = #{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND CHANNEL LIKE CONCAT('%','country','%')
AND lang1Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang1Cnt != 0
AND lang2Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang2Cnt != 0
AND lang3Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang3Cnt != 0
AND lang4Cnt IS NOT NULL AND lang4Cnt != 0

SELECT IFNULL(B.NAME, '-') AS chatbotNm , A.answer , A.utter , DATE_FORMAT(A.createDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createDate FROM ChatbotLog.IntentLog A LEFT OUTER JOIN Chatbot.Account B ON A.host = B.NO WHERE A.sessionId = #{sessionId} AND A.host = #{host} ORDER BY createDate ASC
select No as No , Name as Name from Chatbot.Account

SELECT T.href , T.host , T.lang , T.linkCnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT href , host , lang , COUNT(1) OVER (partition BY href) AS linkCnt FROM ChatbotLog.LinkLog WHERE 1=1 AND host = #{host} AND #{startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND #{endDate} >= DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AND lang = #{lang} ) T ORDER BY T.linkCnt DESC;
